script.name: !plugin.autotrade.getroute.rest
script.description: Autotrade - Get rest ware selling trade route

argument.name: ware.bought
argument.desc: Ware bought on last trade run

line.comment: * Gnasirator, 05.03.2012
* init
* get rid of wares on board if no space left!
* Check rest wares
* check wares
* skip if [THIS]-> find different factory: sells $ware with best price: max.price=$aanull, amount=$aanull, max.jumps=$aanull, startsector=$aanull, trader=$aanull, exclude array=$aanull
* continue
* If we are selling rest ware from last trade run, make sure, we are profitable
* script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
* Just find a suitable sellstation with price > avg
* script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
* double check, if we can't sell ware at DOCKEDAT for the same price
* DOCKEDAT is possibly of class dock and will have the same price as sellstation
* save the jump fuel, simply sell at DOCKEDAT
* [THIS]-> set command: [COMMAND_SELL_WARE_BEST]
* [THIS]-> set wanted ware to $ware
* set script command: [COMMAND_MK3_6505_SCAN]
* Extra check: If sellstation is player-owned and bankrupt, blacklist it
* and search again for a sellstation
* NOPE!, see getroute.docked for reason
* append $station.sell to array $blacklist
* inc $i
* retry the same ware with another sellstation
* Let's assume the ware was bought to perfect conditions (min price)
* if there is some money to be made from leftovers
* The more experience, the more the trader wants to keep cargo space free
* End while
* TODO: if empty cargo extremely low and no route found, throw exception

sval.val: Autotrade - Get rest ware selling trade route
Min Profit
Price, ware was bought for
Ware bought on last trade run
Gnasirator, 05.03.2012
get rid of wares on board if no space left!
Check rest wares
check wares
skip if [THIS]-> find different factory: sells $ware with best price: max.price=$aanull, amount=$aanull, max.jumps=$aanull, startsector=$aanull, trader=$aanull, exclude array=$aanull
If we are selling rest ware from last trade run, make sure, we are profitable
script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
Just find a suitable sellstation with price > avg
script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
double check, if we can't sell ware at DOCKEDAT for the same price
DOCKEDAT is possibly of class dock and will have the same price as sellstation
save the jump fuel, simply sell at DOCKEDAT
[THIS]-> set command: [COMMAND_SELL_WARE_BEST]
[THIS]-> set wanted ware to $ware
set script command: [COMMAND_MK3_6505_SCAN]
Extra check: If sellstation is player-owned and bankrupt, blacklist it
and search again for a sellstation
NOPE!, see getroute.docked for reason
append $station.sell to array $blacklist
inc $i
retry the same ware with another sellstation
Let's assume the ware was bought to perfect conditions (min price)
if there is some money to be made from leftovers
The more experience, the more the trader wants to keep cargo space free
End while
